0.text: Innate: Taliyah gains  10 / 15 / 25 / 40% (based on level) bonus movement speed while near terrain, which builds up over 1 second while in range for at least 0.4 seconds, and decays by the same amount once out of range for at least 3 seconds.

1.text: Entering combat or casting an ability puts Rock Surfing on a  2-second cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in these states.

0.text: Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.

1.text: Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards, and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third Stone Shard.

2.text: Casting Threaded Volley creates a 400-unit area of Worked Ground at Taliyah's location that lasts 30 seconds. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground will instead consume the area to become empowered with a new effect, cost  20 mana and have  50% reduced cooldown, though not below 0.75 seconds.

3.text: Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing  190% damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies,  slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds.  Monsters hit are also  stunned for 3 seconds.

4.text: Against  monsters, Threaded Volley deals 25 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage per Stone Shard, and the Boulder deals 47.5 (+ 19% AP) bonus magic damage against the primary target. This bonus damage is unaffected by the damage modifier from subsequent hits.

0.text: Active: Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 0.759 seconds, a ledge erupts from the area that  knocks enemies hit 400 units in the target direction over 1 second.

Active: Taliyah scatters a field of 22 stones across the ground in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The stones remain for 4 seconds and  slow enemies within the area by 20%.

1.text: Enemies that  dash or are  knocked into a stone will detonate it, dealing magic damage and  stunning them for 2 seconds, which is then set to 0.75 seconds for non- monsters after the movement ends.

2.text: An enemy can detonate up to 4 stones, but the damage is reduced by 0% − 75% (based on stones detonated). Unraveled Earth can affect targets only once per cast; the stones will still detonate but not apply their effects.

3.text: Unraveled Earth deals 150% damage against  monsters.

0.text: Active: Taliyah summons a torrent of spiraling rocks that cascades in the target direction,  knocking aside champions hit and erecting a wall of terrain in its wake. The wall lasts for 5 seconds after completion, then slowly disintegrates from the starting end.

1.text: Taliyah also  channels for 1 second, during which Weaver's Wall can be recast and she  reveals herself. While the wall remains fully formed, she gains another recast empowered with a new effect.

2.text: Recast: Upon completing the  channel, Taliyah  surfs on the wall as it emerges,  revealing herself in the process. After 0.75 seconds, she may input a movement command to  jump off the wall to the target location, and automatically does so upon being  immobilized,  polymorphed, or reaching the finishing end.

3.text: Empowered Recast: Taliyah instantly destroys the wall.

4.text: Weaver's Wall is placed on a  3-second cooldown upon dealing  basic or ability damage, or upon taking  champion or  turret damage.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Echo: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within 600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 magic penetration.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – ECHO: Dealing ability damage to an enemy deals 100 (+ 10% AP) additional magic damage to them and launches orbs at up to 3 other enemies within  600 units around them, impacting after 0.528 seconds to deal the same damage to each, and grants you 15% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds. Dealing ability damage against champions reduces the cooldown of Echo by 0.5 seconds per champion, up to a maximum of 3 seconds per cast (10 second cooldown).

0.concerningText: Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.

Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.

1.concerningText: Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing  190% damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies,  slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds.  Monsters hit are also  stunned for 3 seconds.

Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing  190% damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies,  slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and  revealing them for 0.5 seconds.  Monsters hit are also  stunned for 3 seconds.
